name: Download and Push Mods to Repo (with manual OptiFine) on: workflow_dispatch: push: branches: - main jobs: push_mods: runs-on: ubuntu-latest steps: - name: Checkout Repository uses: actions/checkout@v3 - name: Set Git User run: | git config --global user.name "Your Name" git config --global user.email "your-email@example.com" - name: Download Mods using Python run: | mkdir -p mods python3 -c "import urllib.request; mods = {'IceAndFire.jar': 'https://media.forgecdn.net/files/4614/457/iceandfire-1.16.5-2.1.12.jar', 'Create.jar': 'https://media.forgecdn.net/files/3536/25/create-mc1.16.5_v0.3.2d.jar', 'JEI.jar': 'https://media.forgecdn.net/files/5846/870/jei-1.16.5-7.8.0.1013.jar', 'SpartanWeaponry.jar': 'https://media.forgecdn.net/files/5125/478/SpartanWeaponry-1.16.5-2.2.2.jar', 'FarmersDelight.jar': 'https://media.forgecdn.net/files/3765/350/FarmersDelight-1.16.5-0.6.0.jar', 'SpartanFire.jar': 'https://media.forgecdn.net/files/3858/947/SW_Ice_and_Fire-1.16.5-0.1.3.jar', 'Lycanitesmobs.jar': 'https://media.forgecdn.net/files/5982/776/lycanitesmobs-1.16.5-2.3.3.7.jar', 'firstaid.jar': 'https://media.forgecdn.net/files/3740/166/FirstAid-1.16.5-1.9.8.jar'}; [urllib.request.urlretrieve(url, f'mods/{name}') for name, url in mods.items()]" - name: Commit and Push Changes run: | git remote set-url origin https://x-access-token:${{ secrets.GH_TOKEN }}@github.com/${{ github.repository }} git add . git commit -m "Modファイルを更新" || echo "コミットする変更はありません" git push origin HEAD:main
